CoWorker1: ^Diego? You said you’d meet me back here. Anything notable about this place?
^There you are, boss! I was starting to think you fell into that merch bin over there… or worse! Someone offered you a brand sponsorship, and you evaporated instantly from embarrassment.
^I don’t evaporate. I ignore politely. Now tell me what you found.
^Well! Our little crime scene has two things calling your name.
^The first is the manager! You know about managers— if they aren’t guilty, they’re at least sweaty about something.
^The backstage office of the manager and the victim herself. Locked since the police arrived ‘til now. There’s gotta be useful stuff inside!
^So, confront the woman who’s definitely hiding five lies under one expensive coat and search her office. Got it.
^Exactly! And honestly, boss… you’re terrifyingly good at making people admit things they never planned to say. I mean that as a compliment.
